Den2Obj
Github

Den2Obj - A command line program for producing isosurfaces from density files

Den2Obj is a command-line tool that construct isosurfaces from densely packed scalar fields. Den2Obj supports VASP charge files such as CHGCAR and PARCHG, Gaussian .cube files as well as its own .d2o file format.

Den2Obj can be used together with popular 3D rendering programs such as Blender to produce stunning visuals of your research. Below, a few examples are shown. See also the Examples for a nice overview.
